newsitem.title: USA: Medical Resources files for share offering.
newsitem.headline: Medical Resources files for share offering.

text.p: Medical Resources Inc said it filed a registration statement with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission for a proposed offering of four million shares of common stock.
The proceeds from the offering will be used to finance future acquisitions, repay debt and for general corporate purposes, Medical Resources said.
Dillon Read & Co Inc and Smith Barney Inc will managed the offering, the company said.
Medical Resources operates diagnostic imaging centers and provdes temporary healthcare staffing.
